import React from "react"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import coffeeBg from "../assets/coffee-bg.jpg"; import { FaCoffee, FaWifi, FaGift, FaCalendarAlt, FaShoppingBag } from "react-icons/fa"; import { GiCoffeeCup, GiCoffeePot } from "react-icons/gi"; import { MdLocalOffer, MdEventAvailable } from "react-icons/md"; import { BiDrink } from "react-icons/bi"; const Services = () => { const services = [ { id: 1, title: "Dine-In Service", icon: , description: "Enjoy our premium coffee in a cozy atmosphere" }, { id: 2, title: "Takeaway/Parcel", icon: , description: "Get your favorite coffee on the go" }, { id: 3, title: "Online Ordering", icon: , description: "Order ahead and skip the line" }, { id: 4, title: "Custom Coffee", icon: , description: "Personalized blends just for you" }, { id: 5, title: "Bakery Items", icon: , description: "Fresh pastries daily" }, { id: 6, title: "Free Wi-Fi", icon: , description: "High-speed internet for our guests" }, { id: 7, title: "Loyalty Program", icon: , description: "Earn rewards with every purchase" }, { id: 8, title: "Live Music", icon: , description: "Weekly performances by local artists" }, { id: 9, title: "Seasonal Specials", icon: , description: "Limited-time seasonal offerings" }, { id: 10, title: "Gift Cards", icon: , description: "Perfect present for coffee lovers" } ]; return (

Our Services

Discover the full range of services we offer to enhance your coffee experience

{services.map((service) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.description}

Learn more â†’
))}

Premium Coffee Experience

We're dedicated to providing not just coffee, but a complete experience. From the moment you walk in, you'll notice the difference in our service, quality, and atmosphere.

Service Hours

  • Weekdays 7:00 AM - 9:00 PM
  • Saturday 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM
  • Sunday 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM
); }; export default Services;
